did.abstract: One photostat copy of an 1815 bond between Hannah De Bevoise and the City of New York for the purchase of De Bevoise's land, located in the Fort Greene area of Brookyn, for the purpose of building fortifications during the War of 1812.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Hannah De Bevoise bond, 1977.413, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One photostat copy of a bond between Hannah De Bevoise and the City of New York for the purchase of De Bevoise's land, located in the Fort Greene area of Brookyn, for the purpose of building fortifications during the War of 1812. The bond is dated January 20, 1815.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.
